alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 10:35AM EST until January 21 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches through Saturday night. Most of the snow will fall in two batches, with 2 to 3 inches into this evening, and another 2 to 4 inches Saturday afternoon and evening. * WHERE...Chautauqua county. The greatest accumulations will be localized to the Chautauqua Ridge. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult at times with snow covered roads and reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute today.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
